com.L3MON4D3.voc5.UI

Class LoginActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • AppCompatActivity
      • com.L3MON4D3.voc5.UI.LoadingInfoActivity
        • com.L3MON4D3.voc5.UI.LoginActivity

  • public class LoginActivity
extends LoadingInfoActivity
    Entry Point into App. Users can Login or Register and switch Servers.

      Disable Buttons login and register.

      Load Preferences from Disk.
      void logIn(boolean register)
      As LogIn and Register do essentially the same thing, this method does both and functionality can be switched using bool register.

      protected void onStop()
      Save whether "Remember Me"-Button is checked.

      Open Main Menu once user is logged in.

      Write Status of "Remember Me"-Button in Preferences.

      Stops loading and shows a Toast with message "Couldn't connect to Server".

      • onCreate

        protected void onCreate(Bundle savedInstanceState)
        Overrides:
        onCreate in class LoadingInfoActivity

      • logIn

        public void logIn(boolean register)
        As LogIn and Register do essentially the same thing, this method does both and functionality can be switched using bool register.
        Parameters:
        register - if true, attempts to register user, if false logs in user.

      • setErrorMsg

        public void setErrorMsg()
        Prompts user to check email and password via Toast, sets Error on pwd/emailET.

      • setServerError

        public void setServerError()
        Stops loading and shows a Toast with message "Couldn't connect to Server".

      • setServerError

        public void setServerError(java.lang.String msg)
        Stops loading and shows a Toast with message msg.
        Parameters:
        msg - String to display in Toast.

      • openMainMenu

        public void openMainMenu()
        Open Main Menu once user is logged in.

      • loadPreferences

        public void loadPreferences()
        Load Preferences from Disk.

        public void saveLogin()
        Save Login-data and Server to Disk if "Remember Me"-Button is checked.

      • saveRememberStatus

        public void saveRememberStatus()
        Write Status of "Remember Me"-Button in Preferences.

        Save whether "Remember Me"-Button is checked.
